page.title: 08HORSES AND PONIES
page.content:
HORSES REST HOME
{SHORES HEY FARM
In May this year one of our local farms was bought by the Horses And Ponies Protection Association and has now been converted into a Rest Home for 40 horses and ponies.
Of the 35 acres of land that surrounds the farm buildings about half can be used for hay-making, ensuring 2000 bales of home grown hay, whilst the other half, stretching along the hillside and down to Thursden Brook is rough grazing, ideally suited to the ponies, many of which suffer from laminitis.
